applicationId.description:
Unique string to identify your application. 

 Eg: js.neutralino.sample

defaultMode.description: Mode of the application. Accepted values are window, browser, cloud, and chrome. However, having a config file is not mandatory to start a Neutralinojs app since the Neutralinojs framework often loads reasonable defaults for all configuration options.

x-intellij-enum-metadata.browser: Runs the application in the user's default browser.
x-intellij-enum-metadata.chrome: Runs the application as a Chrome application.
x-intellij-enum-metadata.cloud: Runs the application as a background server.
x-intellij-enum-metadata.window: Runs the application on a native window.
